content:
isaacvetter edited Issue #293(assigned to isaacvetter)

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 87

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Hooks
Section: medication-prescribe
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

Example (DSTU2)

Comment:
According to Hooks documentation, hooks should provide examples across all versions of FHIR where differences are possible. Since it is a MedicationRequest (not MedicationOrder) in FHIR STU3, a FHIR STU3 example should be provided.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #293

Added STU3 examples to both med-prescribe and order-review in PR #388
